Class UserSession

java.lang.Object
theknife.UserSession
public class UserSession extends Object
Singleton class that manages the current user session and application data.

This class handles:

  • User authentication and session management
  • Loading and saving data from/to CSV files
  • Managing restaurants, reviews, bookings, favorites, and replies
  • Providing centralized access to application data

The class follows the Singleton pattern to ensure only one session exists throughout the application lifecycle.

Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
TheKnife Development Team

    • isRestaurantOwner

      public boolean isRestaurantOwner(Restaurant restaurant)
      Checks if the current user owns the specified restaurant. Only restaurants from restaurants_list.csv can be owned by users. Restaurants from michelin_my_maps.csv are not owned by any user.
